original_title: SAS Operation Bulbasket: Part 2 - Destruction of the French railways
overview: Continuing the story of 'Operation Bulbasket' the BHTV team follow the development of the attacks on the railways in order to delay the arrival of crucial German re-enforcements in Normandy. They find the clandestine drop zones where the men and jeeps dropped, look at the targets (railway bridges and junctions) and SAS camps deep in isolated forests, before examining how it all started to unravel.
title: SAS Operation Bulbasket: Part 2 - Destruction of the French railways
